mapper.sql: brand_id, supplier_id,sub_supplier_id, name, type, system_brand_id, description, sort, create_time, create_by, last_modify_time, last_modify_by, remark, audit_time, status,qualification
mapper.select: select b.*, s.name AS supplier_name from s_supplier_brand b ,s_supplier s where b.supplier_id=s.supplier_id and brand_id = #{brandId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.insert: insert into s_supplier_brand (brand_id, supplier_id,sub_supplier_id, name, type, system_brand_id, description, sort, create_time, create_by, last_modify_time, last_modify_by, remark, audit_time, status,qualification) values (#{brandId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{supplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{subSupplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{systemBrandId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastModifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{qualification,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update s_supplier_brand
supplier_id = #{supplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sub_supplier_id = #{subSupplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
system_brand_id = #{systemBrandId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_modify_by = #{lastModifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
audit_time = #{auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
qualification = #{qualification,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where brand_id = #{brandId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update s_supplier_brand set supplier_id = #{supplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sub_supplier_id = #{subSupplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, system_brand_id = #{systemBrandId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_modify_by = #{lastModifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, audit_time = #{auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, qualification = #{qualification,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where brand_id = #{brandId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
select b.*, s.name AS supplier_name,sub.name AS sub_supplier_name FROM (s_supplier_brand b LEFT JOIN s_supplier s ON b.supplier_id=s.supplier_id) LEFT JOIN s_supplier sub ON b.sub_supplier_id=sub.supplier_id where b.status!=3
and b.name like CONCAT('%',#{parameter.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and s.name like CONCAT('%',#{parameter.supplierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and b.supplier_id =#{parameter.supplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and b.status =#{parameter.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}
AND DATE_FORMAT( b.create_time,'%Y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{parameter.startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y%m%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT( b.create_time,'%Y%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{parameter.endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y%m%d')

select b.*, s.name AS supplier_name,sub.name AS sub_supplier_name FROM (s_supplier_brand b LEFT JOIN s_supplier s ON b.supplier_id=s.supplier_id) LEFT JOIN s_supplier sub ON b.sub_supplier_id=sub.supplier_id where b.status=1 and b.supplier_id = #{supplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select b.*,sub.name AS sub_supplier_name FROM s_supplier_brand b , s_supplier sub where b.sub_supplier_id=sub.supplier_id and b.status=1 and b.sub_supplier_id = #{subSupplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM s_supplier_brand WHERE TYPE = 1 and status = 1 AND NAME = #{brandName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT description FROM s_supplier_brand WHERE supplier_id = #{supplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND system_brand_id = #{sysBrandId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND status = 1 LIMIT 1
